//: Template for simulation results in MIA_IA_SYSTEM_v2_2025
Role: Stores the results of trading simulations for the dashboard, managed by simulate_trades.py
- Generated and updated by src/scripts/run_simulate.py and src/trading/simulate_trades.py
- profit: Total profit from simulations in USD
- trades: Number of trades executed in simulations
- sharpe_ratio: Sharpe ratio of the simulation results
- Policies Note: The official directory for routing policies is src/model/router/policies
The src/model/policies directory is a residual and should be verified for removal to avoid import conflicts
- Compliance: No references to dxFeed, obs_t, 320 features, or 81 features
